title: Look and lease today of our available 1 bed 1.5 bath!
map_address: 15808 Bear Creek Parkway near Redmond Way
posting_body: As natural light illuminates spacious studio, one, and two bedroom floor plans, Radiate Apartment’s thoughtful design and uniquely innovative amenities unite to create a modern living experience and a warm and inviting home.

We offer a place for you to foster all your creative and intellectual energies in from outdoor social spaces and co-working spaces to electric car charging stations and gear storage, we have everything you could want and more.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 815 Sq.
- USB charging outlets in living areas
- Subterranean garage with controlled-entry access with dedicated parking
- Onsite retail with unique eateries and shopping right at your doorstep
- Dog wash and self-service grooming area
- Steps from local parks and trails, including Redmond Central Connecter Park and Sammamish River Trail
- Controlled-access bike storage and bike repair room
- Built to Living Green program standards
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
